text:
MongoDB | New York, NY (relocation is available) | Senior Software Engineer (Cloud) | Full-Time | Competitive Base + Pre-IPO stock Options

We are looking for a server-side Java engineer that will work on core functionality for our cloud products, writing code that will help store petabytes of data in MongoDB all over the world, touching millions of users!

At our size, you will have the chance to have a big impact on our future. Do you have any interest or questions? Please reach out to me at JC@mongodb.com or apply here http://grnh.se/kr5738
